frontend/src/features/conversion/videoVa: Checks whether a Blob is a valid video using signature inspection and fallback video element loading.

frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and identity persistence across reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder indicating no backend queries are required.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and a custom OKLCH color theme for light and dark modes with global base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/types/vendor-lame.d.ts: Provides TypeScript declarations for the lamejs MP3 encoder and its window namespace exposure.
